ttl.name: AIR CONDITIONING SYSTEM (for Automatic Air Conditioning System)

step2.ptxt: Air conditioning system data and Diagnostic Trouble Codes (DTCs) can be read through the Data Link Connector 3 (DLC3) of the vehicle. When the system seems to be malfunctioning, use the intelligent tester to check for malfunctions and perform troubleshooting.
By operating each of the air conditioning control switches as shown in the diagram below, it is possible to enter diagnostic check mode.
